      • readFileData

        public static java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Double> readFileData​(java.util.Scanner scan)
        Reads a master list of data and creates a TreeMap with each word and its corresponding difficulty ranking.
        Parameters:
        scan - the scanner used to read the file containing all Spanish words and their difficulties.
        Returns:
        a TreeMap containing words and their difficulty rankings

      • readRecognizedInput

        public static java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> readRecognizedInput​(java.util.Scanner scan)
        Reads the list of recognized user input phrases that was used to train the Doccat categorizer model.
        Parameters:
        scan - the scanner used to read the file containing recognized user input phrases
        Returns:
        a TreeMap containing categories as keys and possible phrases as the values for a category

      • updateDifficulty

        public static void updateDifficulty​(java.lang.String[] lemmas,
                                    java.lang.String currentCateg)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Updates the difficulty of the conversation when the user uses more advanced words that the bot does not have in its list of current vocabulary.
        Parameters:
        lemmas - the String array of lemmatized tokens
        currentCateg - the current conversation category
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if input or output exception occurs

      • rankPhrases

        public static double rankPhrases​(java.lang.String phrase)
                          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                 java.io.IOException
        Ranks the difficulty of each phrase in a possible response category by finding the mean of the pre-determined difficulties of each word. Updates the .txt file to have each word followed by its difficulty (scale of 0-1).
        Parameters:
        phrase - the phrase to have its difficulty analyzed
        Returns:
        a TreeMap containing the initial phrases in the file as keys and their determined difficulties as values
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if input or output exception occurs
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if file is not found

        public static java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Double> getWordsRanked()
        Gets a a TreeMap of words and their difficulty rankings.

        a TreeMap of words and their difficulty rankings

        wordsRanked - the updated a TreeMap of words and their difficulty rankings
